subject: Re: [junit] JUnit not matching to my needs - execute order sh ows design flaw ?
msgSnippet: ... Right. But the problem is finding that one important failure in the list of 250 failures that you got from your test run. cjs -- Curt Sampson
messageBody:
On Sat, 10 Jul 2004, J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

> ....then write one test called "testDatabaseConnection()". If that
> fails, then the rest is self-evident.

Right. But the problem is finding that one important failure in the list
of 250 failures that you got from your test run.

cjs
--
Curt Sampson <cjs@...> +81 90 7737 2974 http://www.NetBSD.org
Don't you know, in this new Dark Age, we're all light. --XTC
